title: Bonus Episode # 11 – "Doctor Death" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this bonus episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you an epic classic horror tale, from the master of the macabre, H.P. Lovecraft, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about a physician who believes death isn’t the end, but just the beginning.   

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
